alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Calhoun; Clarendon; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:42PM EDT until August 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... North central Bamberg County in central South Carolina... Central Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 641 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near St. Matthews to Claflin College to near Bamberg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, Branchville, Summerton, Bowman, Elloree, Santee State Park, Claflin College, South Carolina State University, Orangeburg County Airport, Edisto Gardens, Santee, Cameron, Rowesville, Vance, Cordova, Cope, Poplar Creek Landing, Stumphole Landing, and Prince of Orange Mall. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 140 and 169. Interstate 95 between mile markers 85 and 108. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
